publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4782 Sandra White: Welcome Gaelic Funding—That the Parliament welcomes the announcement that Glasgow is set to benefit from an allocation of £500,000 to increase the provision of Gaelic in the city; notes the continuing success and popularity of the Glasgow Gaelic School; commends the great commitment and dedication of staff and pupils at the school, and believes that this investment will help ensure that the school can continue to build on its fantastic success. Supported by: Alasdair Allan*, Kenneth Gibson*, Anne McLaughlin*, Rob Gibson*, Gil Paterson*
S3M-4782 Welcome Gaelic Funding (lodged on 4 September 2009) Robert Brown*, Bob Doris*, Stuart McMillan*, Bill Kidd*
S3M-4782 Welcome Gaelic Funding (lodged on 4 September 2009) Bill Wilson*, Christina McKelvie*
S3M-4782 Welcome Gaelic Funding (lodged on 4 September 2009) Jamie Hepburn*, Dave Thompson*
S3M-4782 Welcome Gaelic Funding (lodged on 4 September 2009) Ken Macintosh*, Angela Constance*
S3M-4782 Welcome Gaelic Funding (lodged on 4 September 2009) Maureen Watt*, Aileen Campbell*
S3M-4782 Welcome Gaelic Funding (lodged on 4 September 2009) Linda Fabiani*
